relationships.description: Kuhn is pitching a television series to Epstein for potential funding through his foundation
Production company seeking funding from Epstein's foundation for a science television series

analysis.purpose: To schedule a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein to discuss a television series proposal and other topics, following up on a previously submitted proposal for funding
analysis.significance: Shows business relationship between Robert Kuhn and Jeffrey Epstein, with Kuhn seeking Epstein's support/funding for a PBS television series

notable_quotes: Love to meet - on Sleep/Dreams and all sorts of fun stuff to cheer our 2017.
Contemporary advances in sleep/dream research makes timing propitious.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be a standard business communication about meeting to discuss a television series proposal

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed - this is a business proposal for a legitimate television series about sleep and dream science

details: References to Kuhn's media appearances on BBC and YouTube discussing Sino-US relations and Trump
Proposal for PBS television series 'The Science of Sleep and Dreams'

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a private business proposal that would be of media interest given Jeffrey Epstein's notoriety and the involvement of public broadcasting

analysis.summary: Robert Kuhn emails Jeffrey Epstein to schedule a meeting in New York to discuss a proposed 13-episode PBS television series 'The Science of Sleep and Dreams' that Kuhn's production company Closer To Truth wants to produce with funding from Epstein's foundation, along with other topics.
